text: aur jis (zabeehe) par khuda ka naam na liya gaya usamen se mat khao (kyonki) ye beshak badachalanee hai aur shayaateen to apane hava khavaahon ke dil mein vasavasa daala hee karate hain taaki vah tumase (bekaar) jhagade kiya karen aur agar (kaheen) tumane unaka kahana maan liya to (samajh rakho ki) beshubaha tum bhee musharik ho
